website_summaries.verdict: A well-known brand with a die-hard following, the CHI offers heat settings based on your hair type so you can't go wrong.
pros: We love the color-coded heat settings based on hair type on its digital display
With its new titanium-infused plates, it is even smoother than its previous models
cons: The on-off switch and temperature controls are on the inside of the handle, which can be awkward until you get used to it

customer_reviews.title: Did Not Live A Year!
customer_reviews.text: The item initially worked famously. However, it died before a year from purchase date. The cost of the product is ridiculous given it’s short longevity.
customer_reviews.author: The Rocker

customer_reviews.title: Purchase beauty products at a “Brick and Mortar”.

customer_reviews.author: Zach Muehlfelt

customer_reviews.title: Ceramic Coates NOT cera mic plates like I thought

customer_reviews.title: Best Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this hair straightener. In college one of my roommates had this type and I would constantly steal it to do my hair. It is by far THE BEST straightener I have ever tried. I love that you can control the heat and it works so quickly. I have thick curly hair that it not easy to straighten and this iron not only gets the job done but it also works FAST. I can do my whole head in under 20 minutes when my old straightener would easily take 30-45 minutes for a similar result. Seriously can't recommend enough!
customer_reviews.author: @luluprime_

customer_reviews.title: One Star

customer_reviews.title: NOT authentic
customer_reviews.text: Fake product. Seal broken upon arrival and regular two prong plug.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to replace my older model chi straighter that I broke. (My fault, not the devices.) I really like the design with the buttons on the inside of the handle as my previous one had them on the outside. The heating area is broad and stays hot very well. Heats very quickly, too. Love the cord turning attachment at the base so it won't get tangled. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: EmiliesMom

customer_reviews.title: It's fake.
customer_reviews.text: This product appears to be a fake Chi. Not only was the seal cut (as many others have stated), but the power cable was a straight plug without the GFCI. If you like fires, or burning out the devices circuitry, then go ahead and keep this item for a few months before it inevitably dies on you (as many others have stated). Returned. I'd expect Amazon to weed out illegitimate items like this.
customer_reviews.author: Snake Plissken

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC  FLAT IRON
customer_reviews.text: Was pricey but worth every penny! My 10yr old CHI finally died out. I bought this one CHI G2 and wasnt sure about it cause it's digital and was afraid it might not be dependable! It had mixed reviews! Omg, it heats up to the temp in less than a minute....just amazing for straightening! Don't hesitate to purchase. Buy from Amazon and not a third party seller you won't be sorry! A great find on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Seal broken on 2 different orders

customer_reviews.author: licette amaya

customer_reviews.title: love my CHI and the one before it
customer_reviews.text: It came just in time...love my CHI and the one before it...it had over 3300 hours on it. If I wouldn't have dropped it on the floor, it would have probably still been going. As for the warranty, be sure to register per the instructions enclosed in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Stewart

customer_reviews.title: KNOCK OFF, DON’T BUY!

customer_reviews.author: Mariana

customer_reviews.title: Gets hair super straight!
customer_reviews.text: I like that this iron heats up so quickly and straightens my hair really well. Using my previous iron, it took many passes and over an hour. To be fair, it wasn't the best iron. Using this iron, it takes me just an hour and my hair is silky straight and stays straight with the products I use. My hair is thick and dries curly.
customer_reviews.author: Nicdeo

customer_reviews.title: Second time - This not an authentic Chi product
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time ordering this product after speaking to costumer service, both times I have received a knock-off of the real, authentic Chi straightener. Tip offs? Two pronged plug as opposed to the three pronged plug in a Ground Fault Circuit Interrupter with a reset button. I’m not sure how this is being overlooked. The first time I received the Chi, the seal was cut, but the second time it was not. So it seems the company producing this inauthentic product is getting smarter at their job. I’ve now gone ahead and ordered it through Amazon customer service for a third time - let’s hope I get the real deal this time. Will update my review accordingly.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: The max temp is 425 and it's perfect. I had the classic velvet 2 inch chi ...
customer_reviews.text: I need to use a flat iron with a high temp because I have really thick unruly hair. The max temp is 425 and it's perfect. I had the classic velvet 2 inch chi in the past and it recently stopped working, but unfortunately they don't make them any more so this is the next best thing.
customer_reviews.author: Manda

customer_reviews.title: I replaced another, older Chi with this new model ...
customer_reviews.text: I replaced another, older Chi with this new model. Wow, what a difference 10 years makes. I hope this last as long as the old one. It really works well.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Rosen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this flat iron! The broader surface helps get hair done so much faster!!
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: FAKE product
customer_reviews.text: I’d give this product a zero if I could. FAKE product. Do not buy. This is not a genuine Chi Product. This product does not have a ground fault circuit interrupter with a reset button on the plug like genuine CHI products do. The package seal was broken on the flat iron and it appears to be a used or returned product. Also, it has a chip on the top of the base. I did not get a full refund either when I returned the product. Shame on you, Amazon! Update: Amazon did give me a full refund after I called and complained so thanks, Amazon, but the product is still a fake product.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Great straightener

The first time I used it my hair was just as straight as when I get my hair professionally done. I was able to get close to edges and scalp without burning myself. And it straightens with just one pass through! I'm still working on creating curly styles and different looks, however each time I use the flat iron I am pleasantly pleased. I don't have to use much heat as with my previous iron. It heats up very fast and I love the memory heating option. I would highly recommend this flat iron.
customer_reviews.author: C. Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: I Purchased this straightener for my wife 2 months ago ...
customer_reviews.text: I Purchased this straightener for my wife 2 months ago and it won't turn on. The LED screen does not turn on nor does the straightener work. She had her previous straightener for over 5 years and did not have any issues. There is no way for me to contact the seller to replace this device. It is apparent that we received a defective device judging by all of the 5 stars. We would appreciate if we were contacted in order to remedy this situation.We are not in the business of throwing $150 down the drain.

customer_reviews.title: Broken Seal
customer_reviews.text: I’m highly disappointed that I spent this much money for a product with a broken seal. Makes me question the authenticity of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Haines

customer_reviews.title: Wished I Bought One Sooner!
customer_reviews.text: I had to replace my hair straightener when it finally stopped working after 10 years. The brand I had (and liked) was no longer in business so I started researching current brands and kept coming back to the Chi. I was nervous ordering it as some had said they were not legit Chi, but I went ahead with it anyways. Received it as expected, box was not damaged and it was in it's original packaging. I was pleasantly surprised how fast it heats up! I like how it has presets for hair types. It doesn't snag my hair at all and I can straighten it much quicker than before. I wished I had replaced my old one sooner!
customer_reviews.author: EKD71

customer_reviews.title: Great product!

customer_reviews.author: K-Lee42

customer_reviews.title: Excellent hair styling tool
customer_reviews.text: I love this hairstyling iron. Not too heavy, easy to manipulate. My hair takes a curl that holds and does not friss on the ends as it did with my old one. The controls are well placed on the inside of the handle. Heats quickly, the temperature control is fast and easy to read on the display. Definity, feel the ceramic and titanium materials are doing better for my hair and certainly produce a much smoother finish. (I do use Chi thermal protecting spray with any flat iron product).
customer_reviews.author: Nitro Horse

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Chi to replace my old one that died after after several years of use. I love this one! The larger (1 1/2") plates and the different heat settings are perfect! I love, love, love it!
customer_reviews.author: Susan K. Schilling

customer_reviews.title: Best Gift
customer_reviews.text: Fiancée loves this thing! It was a deeply APPRECIATED birthday gift. She has naturally curly hair and loves that this thing heats up fast and straightens in one pass. It also is slightly larger than most so it covers more hair faster but still small enough to make perfect curls. It leaves her hair with a nice shine and doesn’t catch or pull hairs. Also has a hair guide with different temp settings so you never burn/damage hair.

customer_reviews.title: Nice product

My old one had a light that was either solid or flashed indicating whether it was ready. This one has an audible beep. It beeps 3 times when you turn it on and twice once it reaches temperature. It is much louder than necessary and poses a problem when I am trying to not make a lot of noise getting ready in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah

customer_reviews.title: Great product

My hair feels way more soft and healthy! It also works very well - I've never had an issue with it turning on or heating. My only complaint is that it doesn't turn off automatically after so long like some do.
customer_reviews.author: Dayla

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!  Great quality!

customer_reviews.author: Jodie Kavanagh

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!!

My last Chi lasted almost 5 years, hopefully this one does too!

customer_reviews.author: Yolanda R.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, and great outcome!

I was happy with my old Chi but with all of these features on this one I don’t know why I didn’t get this sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanine

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and works great!

customer_reviews.title: I love it

customer_reviews.title: You will not be disappointed

product_meta.title: CHI G2 Ceramic and Titanium 1 1/4" Straightening Hairstyling Iron
product_meta.description:
The dynamic CHI G2 offers a sleek design, upgraded technology and outstanding performances. The G2 features titanium infused ceramic plates for added durability and an even smoother glide. Digital temperature reading displayed on a color coded LCD screen allows for proper temperature setting for fine, medium and coarse hair up to 425°F. Ceramic heater with advanced technology for 40 second heat up. Keep the cord away from heated surfaces. Do not wrap the cord around the appliance. Never allow the power supply cord to be pulled, jerked, strained, twisted, or severely bent, especially at the plug connections. The foregoing may damage the cord, including at or near the high flex point of entry into the appliance, causing it to rupture and short. Handle the cord carefully for longer life

BRAND STORY
CHI haircare and tools are manufactured by Farouk Systems a Houston based company.
